meanings.sent1: The crinoidal fossils found in the rock were very interesting to study.
meanings.sent2: The scientist identified the crinoidal features in the ancient coral reef.
meanings.sent3: The crinoidal patterns on the seashell looked like tiny stars dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her dress shimmered with a crinoidal sparkle under the disco lights.
meanings.sent5: The crinoidal design on the vase was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The crinoidal limestone was full of ancient sea creatures.
meanings.sent2: The geologist discovered a layer of crinoidal rock in the cliff.
meanings.sent3: The crinoidal mix of shells and sand created a unique beach texture.
meanings.sent4: The crinoidal blend of colors in the painting was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The crinoidal composition of the soil provided rich nutrients for the plants.
